1.title: Non molto tempo fa, in un castello non particolarmente lontano....

episode of.title: Sorry the princess is in another castle (TV Series 2018– )

1.plot: Terry Fitzgerald faces the marvelous Delgado Satàn. Pape Satàn asks his son Herbert for some clarification regarding the hero storming their castles.

2.title: Boss Fight

episode of.title: Sorry the princess is in another castle (TV Series 2018– )

2.plot: Herbert Satàn, adamant that he will impress his father Pape, catches up with and faces our hero Terry Fitzgerald. How will this duel end?

3.title: Le chiacchiere stanno a zero

episode of.title: Sorry the princess is in another castle (TV Series 2018– )

3.plot: Terry Fitzgerald storms the castle of Inez Satan, the queen of the zombies: what ensued is the most epic battle in the history of all of humanity ever.

4.title: La festa delle mazzate

episode of.title: Sorry the princess is in another castle (TV Series 2018– )

4.plot: Terry Fitzgerald finally faces Shigeru, the eldest and fiercest of the Satàn brothers. A legendary fight.

5.title: E ora, qualcosa di completamente diverso

episode of.title: Sorry the princess is in another castle (TV Series 2018– )

5.plot: Terry has an informative conversation with Death itself. To continue with his adventure, it is time to focus on a simple side quest.

6.title: Temi l'ira di Pape Satàn

episode of.title: Sorry the princess is in another castle (TV Series 2018– )

6.plot: Terry Fitzgerald is face to face with his enemy clan leader, the diabolical Pape Satàn. Will he finally find the princess in his castle?

7.title: Porco Drago

episode of.title: Sorry the princess is in another castle (TV Series 2018– )

7.plot: Our hero Terry Fitzgerald faces Pape Satàn in his last and most fearsome beastly form. Will he finally be able to defeat True Pape counting only on his own strength? And most importantly, will this finally be the castle in which he finds princess Goddard?

8.title: Midnight

episode of.title: Sorry the princess is in another castle (TV Series 2018– )

8.plot: Terry Fitzgerald arrives at the castle of Midnight Satàn, the last mysterious member of the Satàn family. Who knows if, with him, he will also meet the longed-for princess Goddard.

imdb.title: Sorry the princess is in another castle
plot: Hero Terry Fitzgerald faces the diabolical Satàn family to save Julia Goddard, the beautiful princess they kidnapped.
